title: The most spectacular treehouse in Colombia
subtitle: Treehouse hosted by Houses In The Sky
description: Two hours from Bogotá via Bogotá - Sasaima, experience the unique experience of staying in a tree eight meters above sea level. Wake up to the bird whistle and lie down to the sound of the creek below. Enjoy a five-star suite with all the comforts in the branches of trees. The cabin will be just for you and features hot water, mini fridge and the most spectacular view! Delicious breakfast included!

title: Chalet Boutique Saltamontes Santa Elena
subtitle: Entire cabin hosted by Natalia
description: On the mountain and under the stars you can stay in a cozy and authentic space surrounded by forest and flowers where you will reconnect with life on the countryside.

title: Casa Anís
subtitle: Entire chalet hosted by Doris
description: Private cottage in a country setting with easy access to public transport. It has a large green area,parking and special spaces for roasting and bonfire. Perfect to get out of the routine and visit the tourist sites near Cajicá, such as: Zipaquira Salt Cathedral, Nemocón Salt Mine, Neusa Dam, Tabio Thermal Baths, La Montaña de Juaica, Jaime Duque Park, Señor de la piedra in Sopó, Cogua and its gastronomy, sport fishing and paragliding in Sopó.

title: Finca La Diva Bed & Breakfast
subtitle: Private room in farm stay hosted by Juan David
description: Beautiful mountain landscapes, birds observation, natural mountain forest. English and German speakers.
